attributes.action: Give permission for the Queen to remove the present Prime Minister Boris Johnson
attributes.additional_details:
Since coming to the role, Boris Johnson, has proved himself unfit to hold the office of Prime Minister; he has carried out many actions which have been found to be unlawful, he is not acting in the public interest, he can not be trusted to tell the truth.  

During this Pandemic we need strong and consistent leadership, failure to bring the whole people together, indeed more and more are no longer listening or following the Government, which will undermine the safeguarding of the population
attributes.background: Remove the present Prime Minister from office immediately. On the basis that the Prime Minister has lost the faith, trust and confidence of the people and given that the governing party is corralling it's MP's to vote in a way that is against the public interest.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or the Government to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
